metadata.title: CVE-2020-16094 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In imap_scan_tree_recursive in Claws Mail through 3.17.6, a malicious IMAP server can trigger stack consumption because of unlimited recursion into subdirectories during a rebuild of the folder tree.

criterions.comment: claws-mail package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.17.7-1').
